sections.EXECUTION:
This operation will be conducted in 13 phases
Phase 1 will consist of a packing list layout. 0500-0600
Phase 2 will consist of an ACFT and breakfast. 0600-0900
Phase 3 will consist of an unknown distance ruck. 0900-1030
Phase 4 will consist of day and night land nav and Stress Testing 1030-0100
Phase 5 will consist of bed down, Blow out, UKD Ruck then release for the day 0100-0300
Day 2 Training
Phase 6 will consist of PT and breakfast. 0630-0930
Phase 7 will consist of classes for area recon, ambush and HVT in a classroom environment.
0930-1100
Phase 7 will consist of an area recon practical exercise. 1100-1500
Phase 8 will consist of an ambush practical exercise. 1500-1800
Phase 9 will consist of HVT practical exercise. 1800-2200
Phase 10 will consist of an unknown distance bayonet march, release for the day. 2200-0000
Day 3 Training
Phase 11 will consist of PT, chow, ghost
